title: Skin spotlights replays on recording custom game modes (Ascension, Urf etc.)
body:
I was wondering if skin spotlights records custom game modes, I tried launching the replay file but nothing happened (with an ascension game). I was wondering if it made any difference, thanks! (yes i have waited 3 min after the game, and yes I put my game path to the latest league client).
{{summoner:3}}

replies.body: Cool, I solved the problem. I have to win or lose the game for it to be recorded. Thanks for the reply though!

You can absolutely download and view replays from a custom game! You'll need to click on Profile at the top, then go into Match History. Once there find the match you wanted to view, and on the right-hand side you'll find a button to download the replay.

https://i.gyazo.com/3b71c42dd088524e982b737e1c355f4d.png
